args.natural_language_statement: Prove that convergence of {s_n} implies convergence of {|s_n|}.

result:

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter

/-- If a real sequence s converges to L, then the sequence of absolute values |s_n| converges to |L|. -/
theorem tendsto_abs_of_tendsto {s : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {L : ‚Ñù} (h : Tendsto s atTop (ùìù L)) :
  Tendsto (fun n => |s n|) atTop (ùìù |L|) := by sorry
